title: Zombie Highway Rampage
description: Drive your Rhino truck through hordes of zombies in this zombie apocalypse game. Avoid incoming obstacles such as land mines, bounders, cars and other hazard materials. Shoot and destroy obstacles with bullets.
instructions: Run over zombies for coins in this intense driving and shooting game!

title: Block Dropping Merge
description: Block Dropping Merge is a special but classic number merge puzzle. It's easy to play but hard to master. Show us how good you are among other puzzlers! 1024 2048 4096 8192 16384... Drop them numbers and merge to get bigger numbers and show how smart you are! Play and share your best score now!
instructions: - You will be given numbers to play and count - Drop the number block at bottom or beside to merge - Keep merging to avoid losing the game! - If it is too tricky, check your next number block and plan your next move!

title: Turbo Car Track
description: Get ready for an exhilarating ride with Turbo Car Track! Navigate through winding tracks that get progressively more challenging as your speed increases. Collect gold coins to unlock new, more powerful vehicles and boost your progress. Can you handle the speed and conquer the track? Find out in this thrilling, high-speed adventure!
instructions: Movement: "ARROW KEYS" to Drive

title: Moto Road Rash 3D 2
description: Rev up your engines and feel the thrill of the open road in Moto Road rash 3D 2! This high-octane motorcycle game immerses you in a heart-pounding racing experience where agility and precision are your best allies. Zoom through a dynamic, ever-changing cityscape, weaving between lanes, dodging traffic, and mastering daring stunts.
instructions: WASD/Arrow keys - Race/Steer/Brake

title: Blockapolypse Zombie Shooter
description: Blockapolypse: Zombie Shooter is a defense shooting simulation game with 3D pixel undead creatures. To defend this position, you need to use weapons to defend incoming zombies from 3 directions. After you kill all zombies, you still need to defeat a giant undead creature. As long as you lose all of your HP, you will lose the game. When you earn enough gold coins, you can buy better weapons in the gun shop. Good luck and survive!
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Practice On Me
description: Get ready for a glamorous summer adventure with Practice On Me, the ultimate makeup game! Transform into a festival goddess, beach babe, or blooming flower child in three exciting themed units. Grab your brushes, swipe on lipstick, and let your inner artist shine. Dance at festivals, relax by the beach or embrace nature's beauty. With Practice On Me, the possibilities are endless. Make waves, channel your inner mermaid, and bloom like a flower. Experience a summer adventure like no other!
instructions: Use your mouse to play this game on desktops, or tap to play on mobile devices.

title: Bike Stunt Racing Legend
description: Bike Stunt Racing Legend is not merely a motorcycle racing but also a balanced stunt simulation game. Under a 3D game engine, you are required to ride the motorbike to the finish line in the first place. As long as you can keep high speed, the AI opponent will make mistakes and lose you. Don't be afraid of rolling ramps, pass the green arrows to speed up more easily. Keep calm and step on the gas!
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Basketball.io Dunk Sport
description: Sports Basketball is a thrilling 3D basketball game that will keep you entertained for hours. Whether you're a basketball fan or just love fast-paced Sports games Fun
instructions: Basketball IO is a thrilling 3D basketball game that will keep you entertained for hours. Whether you're a basketball fan or just love fast-paced games, Basketball IO is perfect for you. With easy gameplay using either the keyboard's arrow keys or WASD or mouse click and drag, you can dribble, dodge, and score against opposing teams in offline games.

title: Skyscraper to the Sky
description: Challenge your skills as an engineer and architect in this puzzle game. Build the tallest, most stable skyscraper across 30 levels, from small houses to huge buildings.
instructions: In Skyscraper to the Sky, players build tall skyscrapers by connecting building floors. A single mistake can cause a collapse, adding excitement. The intuitive interface allows easy placement of floors and monitoring of stability. The goal is to build the tallest, most stable skyscraper across 30 levels, from small houses to huge buildings.

title: Emerland Solitaire
description: Welcome to the wonderful country of Emerland! Dive deep into the world of magical tale where great mages battle for the Source of the ancient magic of the Cards! Explore mysterious lands accompanied by heroes that include a noble Knight, an Elven Archeress and a mystical Sorceress to defeat the malevolent Dark Master! Solve puzzles and collect combinations to complete difficult and varied levels! Get rewards and find new assistants!
instructions: Use the left mouse button to interact with in-game UI.

title: Hungry Snake Io
description: Hungry Snake.io is a classic game. Here you can try three game modes, Endless mode, Toilet Man, and Monster Brawl. Please note that there can be no collision between worms! In addition, our team takes user experience very seriously, we are always happy to improve the game so that every player can have a better gaming experience, if you encounter any difficulties during the game, please feel free to leave us a message!
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Zombie Arena 2 Fury Road
description: The player assumes the role of a driver in Zombie Arena 2 Fury Road, whose objective is to navigate a confined arena populated by zombies while using their vehicle as a weapon to overcome waves of the undead and unlock new levels. Also, there are modes where you have to beat the clock or fend off waves of zombies, respectively, and games where you have to live as long as possible.
instructions: In the main campaign, you'll have to complete a number of objectives where you have to do things like wipe out zombies from the battlefield and demolish regions that are filled with zombies.

title: Caillou Chef
description: In "Caillou Chef," Caillou puts on his apron and takes on the role of a chef in a fun and challenging café. The goal of the game is to help Caillou prepare delicious coffees and pancakes for his customers, effectively managing time to keep everyone happy with the service.
instructions: Pancake Preparation: Place batter on the stove, watch the time to avoid burning, and add requested toppings (jam, cream, chocolate). Coffee Service: Serve coffee according to customer orders. Time Management: Manage multiple stoves and coffee makers as difficulty increases. Ensure quick service to keep customer satisfaction high.

title: Doge Match
description: Welcome to Doge Match, a delightful and addictive puzzle game that will keep you entertained for hours! With 36 meticulously crafted levels, Doge Match offers a unique and challenging experience for players of all ages.
instructions: Match Dogs: Swipe to connect dogs of the same color. The more dogs you connect in one move, the more points you earn. Reach the Target Score: Each level has a specific target score. You need to reach or exceed this score to pass the level. Earn Stars: Complete the level within the given time to earn 1, 2, or 3 stars. Aim to collect all three stars in every level for the ultimate challenge.

title: Math King - Math Skill Game
description: Math King is the perfect game to help your kids to improve their Math skills in easy & fun way! This game even helps you to develop calculation speed with high accuracy!
instructions: Addition game : 1 or 2 digit addition, sequential addition. Subtraction game : 1 or 2 digit subtraction to practice on how to subtract. Multiplication game : To learn multiplication tables and multiplying methods to improve recalling ability Division game : Learn to divide 1, 2 or 3 digit numbers Basic to Advanced level for each Math operations Select correct answer from the options below

title: Block Eating Simulator
description: The battle of the blocks begins in the block's arena with this great eating simulator game. Eat blocks around and grow your cube. Become the biggest block of the arena. Find various cube skins. Play single or 2 player! Cube players are all around the arena and they are eating blocks, cubes, and lower-scored players. Each block you eat will give you some points. Try to eat as many blocks as possible and try to eat low-scored players. Try to get to the top of the leaderboard.
instructions: The game is both played single and two player. Player 1: W,A,S,D Player 2: ARROW KEYS On single player mode: Control the camera by LEFT-CLICK and MOUSE Control the camera zoom with: MOUSE SCROLL Use Joystick controls on mobile devices/tablets.

title: Toy Cars: 3D Racing
description: Jump into the car and participate in this racing experience. Compete with other racers, participate in various challenges and time-limited events. Prepare your car and drift. Upgrade your carriage. The engine, tires and chassis improve the overall performance of your car.
instructions: The goal of the game is to get to all races first. PC control: WASD - control of a toy car Control on a mobile device: touch/swipe

title: Shadow Stickman Fight
description: Shadow Stickman Fight is an awesome and intense 2D ninja survival arcade game. You have to survive the endless waves of enemies with stickman ninjas. Every time you pass a belt exam, you get the examiner’s hat and weapon. You can use souls to trade items or earn gifts. You have to follow the white dots and hit the enemies. You have to time your attack when enemies are in your attack distance. You can also enter the arsenal and choose different equipment, like helmets and weapons.
instructions: On PC A = move left D = move right On Mobile Swipe or tap

title: Bubble Shooter Pro 4
description: Get ready for Bubble Shooter Pro 4, the ultimate bubble-popping adventure! The latest sequel introduces exciting new features: the explosive Bomb and Firebomb to pop multiple bubbles at once, Bonus Gifts, and collecting Stars to complete Missions. Customize your gameplay with new Props, Frames, and Hats. Dive into the action and enjoy hours of strategic bubble shooting with these thrilling updates!
instructions: Aim and shoot bubbles to match three or more of the same color and clear them from the board. Use the new Bomb and Firebomb for explosive pops. Collect Stars to complete Missions and earn Bonus Gifts. Customize your game with new Props, Frames, and Hats. The arrow at the bottom shows where your shot will go. Successfully popping groups keeps the board clear, but missing shots adds new rows, pushing bubbles closer to the bottom. Don't let them drop too low, or it's game over!

title: Bridge Wars
description: Gear up for Bridge Wars, a mobile gaming epic blending creativity and strategy. Immerse in a world where tactical mastery meets artistic flair. Draw patterns, summon stickman defenders in 3 seconds, facing relentless enemy vehicles. Upgrade characters, navigate intense environments, and stop foes from breaching. Embark on a thrilling adventure, showcasing tactical mastery against relentless waves!
instructions: HOW TO PLAY Bridge Wars 1. Draw a pattern to spawn your soldiers within 3 seconds. 2. The soldiers spawned will attack the enemy vehicles who will try to cross the bridge full of barricades. 3. Visit the shop to upgrade your arsenal such as armor, weapons, and utilities. 4. Come back stronger & defeat the waves of attacking enemies as they approach heavy vehicles. 5. Stop the enemy before they break the barricade & run away to secure your victory.

title: Farm Tiles Harvest
description: Dive into 'Farm Tiles Harvest,' an engaging tile-matching game set in a quaint farm setting! Draw up to 9 tiles featuring fruits, veggies, and farming tools. Try to draw 3 similar tiles to clear them, or drawing the 9th tile will end the game. Shuffle tiles to reveal hidden ones, and complete each level within the time limit. Can you harvest them all?
instructions: Use mouse or touch-pad to select a tile.

title: Mermaidcore Aesthetics
description: In Mermaidcore Aesthetics, you'll embark on a thrilling undersea adventure alongside three fabulous fashionistas. Each mermaid has a unique and stunning wardrobe that will make your inner fashionista do a happy dance! With a wide selection of clothing options and accessories available at your disposal, you'll have endless possibilities to create your fashionable mermaid looks. Have a blast!
instructions: Use your mouse to play this game

title: Extreme Car Driving Simulator
description: Extreme Car Driving Simulator is recommended as a hard-core car driving simulation game. Under a 3D realistic game engine, you can play 4 different game modes to test your driving skills. In the Open World Mode, you can get missions on the road to transport passengers. In the Parking Mode, you can park the car in extremely difficult environments. I hope you have enough confidence to challenge them and buy another 6 better cars.
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Soccer Dash
description: Soccer dash is a soccer game in which you swipe a soccer ball through obstacles and soccer players and hit the ball to score a goal. You have drag controls, drag to choose the direction of the kick, and release to hit the ball. During the dragging process, the game goes into a slow motion state, so you can take your time to choose the direction of the kick.
instructions: The goal of the game is to bypass all the traps and score a goal. Management - swipe the ball. Change the direction of the kick and release to launch the ball.

title: Quest by Country
description: Quest by Country - an engaging game that allows players to identify countries by their flags. This captivating task serves as an educational tool, expanding players' knowledge of the diversity of countries and the symbolism conveyed through their flags.
instructions: Choose to which country does the displayed flag belong. Answer all questions in the quest correctly.

title: Fighter Stick Hero
description: Welcome to Figher Stick Hero Stickman, an exhilarating 2D stickman game that will test your dueling skills. Whether you're playing in an arcade or survival mode, get ready to engage in intense battles against your opponents. Choose from a variety of weapons, character colors, and character decorations to customize your stickman. Remember to attack while moving to gain an advantage and earn higher scores by defeating other stickmen.
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Alien Hunters
description: A fast-paced game where you will play a role of a robot hunter with a deadly dagger of light. With multiple enemies to kill, and a lot of challenging missions to complete, this game will take you on a captivating and thrilling adventure.
instructions: Tap or click on the screen to move the character. The aim is to sneak behind the enemy and neutralize it. Kill all the enemies to complete a level.

title: BFFs Y2K Fashion
description: Welcome to BFFs Y2K Fashion, the exciting new fashion designer game that lets you explore the trend of the year 2000! With a wide selection of styles from the decade, you can create the perfect look and express your fashion sense. From skater girl skirts to ripped jeans and t-shirts, or even the classic Y2K look with fun-colored low-waisted jeans and crop tops, you can customize your outfit and become an ultimate fashion designer. Play now and let your style shine!
instructions: Use your mouse to play this game on desktops, or tap to play on mobile devices.

title: Supermarket Cashier Simulator
description: Practice being the best cashier in the supermarket. Become a mathematician by calculating and entering prices of grocery items and giving change to your customers. By playing you also improve your mathematical skills with the calculator in the game. This game is suitable to be played by adults or teenagers. With the supermarket cashier game, you will improve your skills and concentration in calculating and also increase your level of accuracy.
instructions: - Enter the price according to the price of the item - calculate total purchases - Receive the money and give the remaining money to the buyer

title: Restaurant VIP Masterchef
description: Restaurant VIP is a game where you have to run a restaurant and bring your management skills to every diner! Survive the daily target to get high score.
instructions: play with mouse

title: Supermarket Sort N Match
description: In 'Supermarket Sort n Match,' rearrange items between shelves to match 3 identical items on one shelf, clearing it and allowing upper shelves to slide down. Clear entire stacks to shift adjacent shelves. Collect all items before time runs out as difficulty increases with each level. Enjoy the ultimate item-sorting and matching challenge!
instructions: Use your mouse or touchpad to drag items between shelves. Match 3 identical items on one shelf to clear it and let upper shelves slide down. Clear entire stacks to shift adjacent shelves. Collect all items before time runs out!

title: Festival Vibes Makeup
description: Join Ellie in Festival Vibes Makeup, a vibrant game radiating the spirit of the summer festivals. Delight in creating neon, boho-Aztec, and grunge makeup looks as you test your makeup artist skills in this colorful makeup game for girls. Mix, match, and shine with stunning eyeshadows, mascaras, lipsticks, and glitter eyebrows!
instructions: Use your mouse to play this game.

title: Mustang City Driver
description: Dive into city driving with four game modes. Navigate realistic traffic and monitor your fuel while exploring busy streets. Enjoy stunning night city graphics, transforming the city into a neon-lit spectacle. Pedestrians add unpredictability, and hitting them triggers police chases. Customize your car's appearance and performance. All this chaos is accompanied by your cute dog. Whether evading the cops or just cruising, Mustang City Driver offers a thrilling and visually amazing experience.
instructions: W, A, S, D/Arrow Keys: Drive/Steer/Brake Left Shift: Nitro C: Change Camera G: Slow Motion

title: Stickman The Flash
description: Stickman The Flash is a fighting RPG arcade game with 2D stickman warriors. In the Survival Mode, you need to survive as long as you can by dodging red areas and killing incoming enemies. You can collect different weapons when you kill the corresponding enemies. When you earn enough gems, you can unlock and equip them in the Equipment Store, and they will increase your full abilities. Keep calm and slaughter them all!
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Hammer Master－Craft & Destroy!
description: Do you want to relax and smash everything you see with a huge hammer? In this free casual 3D game we have successfully combined the mechanics of merging, crafting weapons, destroying objects, etc. Click "Play" & relieve your stress by breaking all around!
instructions: **Game goal: Smash objects and earn in-game currency. Collect crystals and combine them correctly to create a new hammer. **Controls: To strike, move your finger left and right on mobile or the mouse with the left button held down on PC.

title: Rummy 500 Card Game
description: Features : - Offline game. - 3 Super Modes: classic mode, 3 player mode and Speed mode. - Auto arrange the cards - Game statistics. - Easy to play - Excellent and fair ai to play with. - Continue the last game from where you left. - No login required
instructions: Left mouse button

title: Fruit Candy Merge
description: Welcome to Fruit Candy Merge, where juicy fruits and sweet candies come together in a delightful merging puzzle! Combine matching candies to create delicious fruit combos and watch them burst with flavor. With addictive gameplay and colorful challenges, can you merge your way to fruity success?
instructions: Tap to drop fruit candies from above. Merge identical candies to create new combos and score points. Utilize the 'Remove Smallest Item' button to clear tiny fruit candy instances from the stage. Embark on an unstoppable fun travel!

title: Wave Chic Ocean Fashion Frenzy
description: Welcome to the game in which every new tide carries a new wave of style! Help two girlfriends to celebrate the new beach season with dignity. Each of the girls has her own unique sense of fashion and style. Combine swimsuits with a variety of accessories to create unique summer looks. And don't forget to pick up a surfboard or a sapboard. Get ready for adventures on the water and to become the most stylish on the whole coast!
instructions: In this dress up game you will meet two young heroines who are preparing for a vacation on the beach and need your help to create fashionable images for the beach. In the game, you can change images as many times as you want, creating new combinations and experimenting with fashion. The result can be saved as a PNG image. Depending on the gaming device, a computer mouse click or a simple touch on touch screens is used to control it.

title: Urban Assault Force
description: Step into the boots of an elite counter-terrorism unit in Urban Assault Force, an intense first-person shooter that plunges you into the heart of urban warfare. The city is under siege by a ruthless terrorist group, and it's up to you and your team to strike back and save the day.
instructions: - Left Mouse to Shot - Right Mouse button for Scope - E to Pick UP and rescue - 1,2,3,4,5 to change weapon

title: Draw Bridge Challenge
description: Drag to create a path and guide the car to the goal! You can only draw the line once, be careful not to break the car! To become a good bridge builder, you just need to drag with one finger to draw a bridge that is stable enough for the car to reach flags. You can draw a bridge on only one line, so make sure safety comes first.
instructions: Tap to play

title: Granny 3 Return the School
description: The Granny Series continues with Granny 3: Return to the School. As Granny and Slendrina pursue you, you must discover the ammunition-filled pistol and all the keys to the classrooms of the deserted school. Entering the classroom, you'll find a solitary desk labeled "Granny" and the necessary keys to unlock the closed door.
instructions: The main objective of the game is to try to survive as long as you can by collecting items to hide and escape from Granny. Controls: WASD to move Right click to shoot F Interact Esc Menu

title: 2048 Cube Shooting Merge
description: 2048 Cube Shooting Merge is an addictive merge puzzle online game for those who like challenging brain teasers and logic puzzle merge games. This game is in 3D with crazy fun physics! The squares don't stay in place, they pop up. The gameplay is much simpler. If you like 2048 games and want to play a novel mode, join the game.
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Strawberry Shortcake
description: Strawberry Shortcake has big dreams. She wants to be the BEST baker that Big Apple City has ever seen and that's why she packed her bags and went to live with her Aunt Praline to the only place where a baker can go if they want to become the best in the whole world: the BIG APPLE CITY!
instructions: Navigate through the app by swiping (touchscreen devices) or clicking (mouse devices) on the screen elements as directed.

title: Line on Hole
description: Play Line on Hole online for free.  game.
instructions: Click or tap to play

title: V And N Pizza Cooking Game
description: Experience the ultimate virtual pizza-making adventure with the V And N Pizza Cooking Game! Craft delicious pizzas from scratch, choose mouthwatering toppings, and master the art of baking. From classic favorites to innovative creations, unleash your inner chef and create culinary masterpieces.
instructions: Left Mouse button click

title: The Trendy Mermaid
description: Embark on an exciting journey of makeup, accessories, and fashion to help Ariel make an unforgettable comeback. With a wide selection of clothes, makeup, and accessories, help Ariel become the trendiest mermaid ever. Enjoy making her look dreamy and fabulous - The Trendy Mermaid is free to play for every girl.
instructions: Use your mouse to play this game

title: Tie-Dye Explosion of Color
description: Welcome to the new game for girls who love juicy colors and stylish outfits. In this game you will meet two girlfriends: the self-confident Kaylee and the sweet Marie. The game begins in a world painted in bright colors, where girls want to create the most unusual and colorful outfits using the Tie-Dye technique. Join creative girlfriends and create the brightest and most stylish outfits in the world of Tie-Dye!
instructions: In this game you will become a real expert in the fashionable tai-dai technique. Show your imagination and creativity by choosing makeup, outfits and accessories for the young heroines of the game! The result can be saved as a PNG image. Depending on the gaming device, a computer mouse click or a simple touch on touch screens is used to control it.

title: Sigil Seeker
description: Welcome to Sigil Seeker!\nEmbark on a quest to collect mystical sigils by tapping tiles on the screen. Add tiles to your row, aiming to gather three identical sigils to collect them. Your goal is to gather all the sigils before time runs out. But beware, if your row overflows or the clock reaches zero, the game is over.\nAre you ready to become the ultimate Sigil Seeker? Dive in and start your adventure now!
instructions: Use a mouse or touchpad to play this game.

title: Summer Connect
description: You can test your pattern detection skills in this relaxed mahjong & connect puzzle game with summer theme. You can eliminate pair of same tiles. The line connecting the two clicked tiles can't have more than 2 corners. Some levels the tiles can auto slide( to left, to right, to up, to bottom). Can you clear the board before time runs out? Enjoying matching summer tiles with 30 puzzle stages in this game.
instructions: Use mouse to play this mahjong connect games with the summer theme.

title: Summer Spotlight Differences
description: Dive into the sunny and captivating world of Summer Spotlight Differences, a delightful spot-the-difference game that's perfect for all ages. This engaging game challenges you to find all 5 differences in each level to advance to the next, offering endless fun and a great way to sharpen your observational skills. Enjoy the challenge and have a blast with this fantastic spot-the-difference game!
instructions: Use mouse to play.
